price: But they will never wish for that because of what their hands have sent forth. And Allah is All-Knowing of the wrongdoers.
arabic: وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوۡهُ أَبَدَۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
